patthana21.13:1.1: Nasārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.13:2.1: Nasārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.13:3.1: Naanārammaṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.13:4.1: Nocittaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:5.1: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Naakusale tīṇi. Naabyākate tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:6.1: Nacetasikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:8.1: Nacittasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:10.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:12.1: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:14.1: Nacittasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:16.1: Nacittānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:18.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:20.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:22.1: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:24.1: Naajjhattikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:26.1: Nanoupādā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.13:28.1: Naanupādinnaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
